quotes.quote: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
The world is a dangerous place to live, not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don't do anything about it.
Be a lover of the world, it is the only way to survive in it.
The world is not to be put in order. The world is order. It is for us to put ourselves in unison with this order.
The most incomprehensible thing about the world is that it is at all comprehensible.
The world is a playground, and life is pushing my swing.
The world is populated in the main by people who should not exist.
The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.
The world needs anger. The world often continues to allow evil because it isn't angry enough.
God used beautiful mathematics in creating the world.
The world is more malleable than you think and it's waiting for you to hammer it into shape.
The world is not in any sense in danger from itself. The world is in fact not in any danger at all. It is we who are in danger.
The world is not comprehensible, but it is embraceable: through the embracing of one of its beings.
The world in which we were called to exist was an absurd world, and there was no other in which we could take refuge.
The world is getting to be such a dangerous place, a man is lucky to get fout of it alive.
If the world is cold, make it your business to build fires.
The world knows nothing of its greatest men.
The world is a stage; each plays his part, and receives his portion.
The world's a stage where God's omnipotence, His justice, knowledge, love and providence, Do act the parts.
But in this world nothing is sure but death and taxes.
The world is a beautiful book, but of little use to him who cannot read it.
The world's a theatre, the earth a stage, which God and nature do with actors fill.
This world is full of beauty, as other worlds above, and if we did our duty, it might be as full of love.
The world is but a perpetual see-saw.
The world is large, when its weary leagues two loving hearts divide; But the world is small, when your enemy is loose on the other side.
I believe the world is incomprehensibly beautiful - an endless prospect of magic and wonder.
The world is not something to understand. Instead, you just adapt to it.
The world is like a dropped pie most of the time. Don't kill yourself trying to put it back together. Just grab a fork and eat some of it off the floor. Then carry on.
